mapper.select: SELECT uam.user_award_id, uam.create_time, uam.used_status, uam.point, buyer.user_id, buyer.`name`, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, a.award_id, a.award_name, uam.operator_id AS operator_id FROM tb_user_award_map uam, tb_person_info buyer, tb_shop s, tb_award a WHERE uam.user_id = buyer.user_id AND uam.shop_id = s.shop_id AND uam.award_id = a.award_id AND uam.user_award_id = #{userAwardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_award_map(user_id, award_id, shop_id, operator_id, create_time,used_status,point)VALUES (#{user.userId},#{award.awardId},#{shop.shopId},#{operator.userId},#{createTime},#{usedStatus},#{point})
